title: ReportDefinition
description: The ReportDefinition stored as definition.pbir provides the overall definition of a report. It contains metadata about the overall file structure and provides core settings. It holds the DatasetReference where exactly one of either byPath or byConnection is required. The byConnection property would typically be used for LiveConnect scenarios. This file is required.

DatasetReference.title: DatasetReference
DatasetReference.description: Describes the dataset bound to this report.

ReportDatasetReferenceByConnection.title: ByConnection
ReportDatasetReferenceByConnection.description: Provides a reference to a remote dataset using a connection string.

connectionString.title: ConnectionString
connectionString.description: The connection string referring to the remote dataset.

pbiServiceModelId.title: PbiServiceModelId
pbiServiceModelId.description: Information used by Power BI Service.

pbiModelVirtualServerName.title: PbiModelVirtualServerName
pbiModelVirtualServerName.description: Information used by Power BI Service.

pbiModelDatabaseName.title: PbiModelDatabaseName
pbiModelDatabaseName.description: Information used by Power BI Service.

connectionType.title: ConnectionType
connectionType.description: The type of connection, typically would be one of the following: pbiServiceLive, pbiServiceXmlaStyleLive, pbiserviceOnPremLive, analysisServicesDatabaseLive.

ReportDatasetReferenceByPath.title: ByPath
ReportDatasetReferenceByPath.description: Provides a reference to a local dataset artifact definition.

path.title: Path
path.description: Provides a reference to a remote dataset using a connection string.

version.title: Version
version.description: Version of the report artifact file format.  This also serves as the version number for the .pbir file format.
